unittitle_ssm: Julius Manson Papers
abstract_ssm: Julius J. Manson (1907-1988) was a New York City professor and labor mediator and arbitrator.  The Julius Manson Papers include notes, correspondence, publications, research materials, articles, and photographs and are primarily from the 1940s through the 1970s.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
New School for Social Research (New York, N.Y.)
City University of New York -- Employees
subject_ssm: Labor laws and legislation -- New York (State)

Non-print items include: pin, I.D. tags, audiotapes on seminars, meetings.
